Eligibility: No tumour invading the chest wall (T3 disease)
No internal breast nodes expanded by CT scan
American Society of Anesthesiologists (ASA) Physical Status Classification 1-2
No other known co-occurring, invasive malignancy
No known allergy to methylene blue or isosulfan
No previous chest or cardiac surgery
No previous placement of ipsilateral thoracic tube
Contralateral placement of the authorized thoracic tube
No radiotherapy prior to the mediatanum
Results: Success rate in the elimination of sentinel lymph nodes by thoracoscopy
Title of the arm/group: Sentinel lymph nodes biopsy
